<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet"><sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_303279_uimesohun.testscriplet</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>testscriplet</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
    "name": "Selected Records",
    "label": "selected_records",
    "description": "selected_records",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "string",
    "mandatory": false,
    "defaultValue": "1213123"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "selected_records",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform (input){


	var test = input["Selected Records"];


	var gr = new GlideRecord("x_303279_uimesohun_grocery_items");
	gr.initialize();

	gr.setValue("name", "asdasd");
	gr.setValue("quantity", "12");
	gr.insert();

	return test;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-04 14:12:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>fdff163f47dc521076b88f59e16d435a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>testscriplet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="UIMeSoHungry" source="x_303279_uimesohun">68a3466b4703021076b88f59e16d4393</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="UIMeSoHungry">68a3466b4703021076b88f59e16d4393</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet_fdff163f47dc521076b88f59e16d435a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-04 14:19:30</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fdff163f47dc521076b88f59e16d435a"/></record_update>
